edge: Sanjay Leela Bhansali is the composer of the soundtrack album Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela.
The lyrics of the songs in the soundtrack album Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela are written by Siddharth–Garima.
The song "Mor Bani Thanghat Kare" is included in the soundtrack album Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela.
The 1944 Gujarati song "Mor Bani Thanghat Kare" is translated by Jhaverchand Meghani.
The 1944 Gujarati song "Mor Bani Thanghat Kare" is composed by Hemu Gadhavi.
The background score of the film Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela is composed by Monty Sharma.
The release of the soundtrack album Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela was delayed due to Ranveer Singh's health issues.
